directions: Whisk the cream of mushroom soup, soy sauce, parsley, black pepper, Italian seasoning, chili powder, sugar, and milk together in a saucepan until smooth. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Cream of Mushroom Sauce
